title: My Favorite Murder Presents: Tenfold More Wicked - Episode 1: All That is Wicked: The Schutts
description:
My Favorite Murder presents the first episode of Tenfold More Wicked. In 1842 Edward Rulloff, a mysterious young academic, charms his way into the Schutt family in Dryden, a small village in Upstate New York. He’s hardworking and loyal—he impresses the prominent family. Edward is a good husband, at first. But the Schutts quickly learn that he’s also arrogant, jealous…and vengeful.


Listen and subscribe to Tenfold More Wicked on Apple Podcasts, Stitcher, Spotify, or wherever you listen to podcasts.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
